definition: to forget bad feelings/to mend a relationship
to explain/to release/Buddha (abbr. for 釋迦牟尼|释迦牟尼[Shi4 jia1 mou2 ni2])/Buddhism
to dislike/suspicion/resentment/enmity/abbr. for 嫌犯[xian2 fan4], criminal suspect
to convert an enemy into a friend (idiom)
to pledge undying love (idiom); oath of eternal love/to swear by all the Gods
debt of gratitude coupled with duty to avenge
lit. to exchange weapons of war for gifts of jade and silk (idiom)/fig. to turn hostility into friendship
pinyin: hua4 gan1 ge1 wei2 yu4 bo2

definition: see 解鈴還須繫鈴人|解铃还须系铃人[jie3 ling2 hai2 xu1 xi4 ling2 ren2]
to dispel (enmity, misunderstandings etc)/to vanish (of misgivings, differences of opinion)/thaw (in relations)
to become reconciled/to bury the hatchet
anger against a common enemy (idiom); joined in opposition to the same adversary
to be of one mind/to work as one
